abstract: Pugnacious antics of Egyptian lawmaker and staunch Abdel Fattah el-Sisi supporter Mortada Mansour have served to confirm public opinion that nation's new Parliament is fractious, ineffectual and heavily weighted in favor of Sisi; Mansour seems to relish his notoriety.
lead_paragraph: For many Egyptians, Mortada Mansour’s behavior has only confirmed their low expectations of the new Parliament, which is weak and heavily tilted in favor of President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.

headline.main: Flamboyant Egyptian Politician Craves Public Eye
headline.print_headline: Flamboyant Egyptian Politician Craves Public Eye

snippet: For many Egyptians, Mortada Mansour’s behavior has only confirmed their low expectations of the new Parliament, which is weak and heavily tilted in favor of President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.
